QueryDefinition.Query:
with base as ( select SEQN, SDDSRVYR, RIAGENDR, RIDAGEYR, RIDRETH1 from Demo JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND SEQN = ch.PERSON_ID union select SEQN, SDDSRVYR, RIAGENDR, RIDAGEYR, RIDRETH1 from Demo_B JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND SEQN = ch.PERSON_ID union select SEQN, SDDSRVYR, RIAGENDR, RIDAGEYR, RIDRETH1 from Demo_C JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND SEQN = ch.PERSON_ID union select SEQN, SDDSRVYR, RIAGENDR, RIDAGEYR, RIDRETH1 from Demo_D JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND SEQN = ch.PERSON_ID union select SEQN, SDDSRVYR, RIAGENDR, RIDAGEYR, RIDRETH1 from Demo_E JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND SEQN = ch.PERSON_ID union select SEQN, SDDSRVYR, RIAGENDR, RIDAGEYR, RIDRETH1 from Demo_F JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND SEQN = ch.PERSON_ID union select SEQN, SDDSRVYR, RIAGENDR, RIDAGEYR, RIDRETH1 from Demo_G JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND SEQN = ch.PERSON_ID )
select *, case SDDSRVYR when 1 then convert(date,'01/01/1999') when 2 then convert(date,'01/01/2001') when 3 then convert(date,'01/01/2003') when 4 then convert(date,'01/01/2005') when 5 then convert(date,'01/01/2007') when 6 then convert(date,'01/01/2009') when 7 then convert(date,'01/01/2011') end as observation_period_start_date, case SDDSRVYR when 1 then convert(date,'12/31/2000') when 2 then convert(date,'12/31/2002') when 3 then convert(date,'12/31/2004') when 4 then convert(date,'12/31/2006') when 5 then convert(date,'12/31/2008') when 6 then convert(date,'12/31/2010') when 7 then convert(date,'12/31/2012') end as observation_period_end_date, case SDDSRVYR when 1 then 1999-RIDAGEYR when 2 then 2001-RIDAGEYR when 3 then 2003-RIDAGEYR when 4 then 2005-RIDAGEYR when 5 then 2007-RIDAGEYR when 6 then 2009-RIDAGEYR when 7 then 2011-RIDAGEYR end as year_of_birth, case RIDRETH1 when 1 then 38003563 when 2 then 38003564 end as ethnicity_concept_ID, case RIDRETH1 when 3 then 8527 when 4 then 8516 when 5 then 8522 end as race_concept_ID, ethnicity_source_value = RIDRETH1, race_source_value = RIDRETH1 from base
